scripts.pub: npm run build && git add . && git commit -a && npm version patch && git push origin master && npm publish

scripts-info.build: Transpiles current project from TypeScript into JavaScript
scripts-info.start: Start dev build of the project
scripts-info.debug: Start debug build of the project
scripts-info.debug-brk: Start debug build of the project and break execution at first line of code
scripts-info.debug-brk-alt: Start debug build of the project and break execution at first line of code using different than standard debug port
scripts-info.info: Display information about the package scripts
scripts-info.fix: Try to automatically fix any linting problems
scripts-info.test: Lint and unit test the project
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save, then rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.prepare-release: One-step: clean, build, test, publish docs, and prep a release
